Articles.Content:
So I played for 6 hours straight on a science game and I got off for the day and the next day I get on and every time i click my save and click "Load" It does nothing but act like the popup is gone and im at the main menu

how can i fix

 

 

Edited July 13, 2019 by CRANSBERRY2K

2 hours ago, CRANSBERRY2K said:

So I played for 6 hours straight on a science game and I got off for the day and the next day I get on and every time i click my save and click "Load" It does nothing but act like the popup is gone and im at the main menu

how can i fix

Are you on Steam?If you are try to Verify the files, Right Click Kerbal in Library->Properties->Local Files->Verify Intergrity

Also from the Properties->Updates Disable Cloud Saving.

Last if you open Local Files it opens the game directory, there you find the ''saves'' folder, always backup that, and the ''Gamedata'' is the place you put mods.

Edited July 13, 2019 by Boyster
